data.title: Community Health Clinic in Centerville, IA
data.meta_description: River Hills Community Health Center in Centerville, IA offers medical, dental, and behavioral health services. Our expert practitioners are ready to help you reach optimal health. Click now!
data.text:
Serving the Centerville Community

River Hills Community Health Center in Centerville, IA is proud to provide services to our community.

We have expert practitioners ready to address your needs. Below is our address, a map to our location, our telephone number and hours for each clinic. Please contact us for an appointment!

Monday 7:30 a.m. – 6:00 p.m.

Tuesday 7:30 a.m. – 6:00 p.m.

Wednesday 7:30 a.m. – 6:00 p.m.

Thursday 7:30 a.m. – 6:00 p.m.

Friday 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m

Centerville Location

1015 N 18th St

Suite C

Centerville, IA 52544

Phone: 641-856-4400

Call our office 24 hours a day to access Triage nurse

Billing and Medical Records

Our billing and medical records departments are located at 116 W Main St, Ottumwa, IA. To obtain copies of your medical records or for billing inquiries, please call 641-684-6896.

RHCHC will not deny any services due to the inability to pay. We offer a sliding fee scale for patients who qualify based on poverty guidelines.

We accept payment from Medicare, Medicaid and most private insurances.
